Title: Accordion FAQ
Description: This is a very simple javascript (jQuery) and css that will make it very easy for you to create what is called an Accordion FAQ with nice sliding animation.
HomeWiki:
Hi everyone.

This is a very simple javascript (jQuery) and css that will make it easy for you to create what is called an Accordion FAQ.

This is the type of FAQ that has all the questions listed and once you click on one, the answer slides below pushing everything down.

My initial aim was to have it as plain as possible so it can be used on all kinds of websites and CMSs and I also wanted to be able to create a long list of FAQ without writing much markup with classes, styles etc. Just simple copy paste of the question and answer.

So enjoy and if you find a way to make it even better please share what you have come up with.

Feel free to talk with me about anything.
